resources.string: Welcome Adventurer. You are about to embark on a journey to collect the treasures of EDALOT! First we need to fill out your travel papers and then you can be on your way. %n %n Tap to Continue . . . %p %n What will be thy username on thy quest? %n %n username: %i %n And thy password? %n %n password: %i %n Could you repeat that for the record house? %n %n password: %i %n Excellent. Now before you embark on your journey, let me tell you about the treasures of EDALOT. . . %n %n Tap To continue . . . %p
